entry.title: Bringing the Unix Philosophy to the 21st Century | Brazil's Blog
entry.summary: Try the jc web demo! Do One Thing Well The Unix philosophy of using compact expert tools that do one thing well and pipelining them together to manipulate data is a great idea and has worked well for the past few decades. This philosophy was outlined in the 1978 Foreward to the Bell System Techni...

entry.title: An Opinionated Guide to xargs
entry.summary: Preliminaries What Is xargs? It's an adapter between text streams and argv arrays, two essential concepts in shell. You pass it flags that specify how to split stdin.
